title: "Scientists Warn That Ad-Targeting Neural Networks Could Use “Infinite” Energy"
excerpt: "The neural networks behind social media’s sophisticated ad targeting could swallow the whole energy grid without ever getting to where their creators want them, scientists are warning. Researchers behind a recent study out of the University of Copenhagen warn that there’s not enough energy in the world to train neural networks to perfection,"
